title: Intro
content: Greetings Spectators! Tune into the official broadcast of Digidamara now.

title: Welcome
content:
Welcome to the Digidamara Dancefloor!
Take a look at those team profiles and get sponsoring!
The team with the lowest energy at the end of each day will be . . . eliminated!
I'm ever so happy that you are here.

title: Welcome
content:
Thank you for tuning in Spectators.
Your energy will help you sponsor, join and gift.
Don't forget, your bonds carry over from day to day.
I, too, am, happy. To feel your presence.

title: Break time with the Teams
content:
Spectators: some teams are taking their obligatory short break. 
Please tune into the universal waveform if you have questions for them.

title: Vote Now!
content:
How are you doing you wonderful beings?
Supporting your favourite team until the end?
Don't forget to vote! We can't build the new universe without you!

title: Break time with the Teams
content:
Spectators: some teams are taking their obligatory short break. 
Please tune into the universal waveform if you have questions for them.

title: Join Now
content:
Checking in hip catz!
Who has become your favourite?
If you join a fanclub, you'll unlock a special signal!
Oh I do love making connetions!

title: Break time with the Teams
content:
Spectators: some teams are taking their obligatory short break. 
Please tune into the universal waveform if you have questions for them.

title: Goodnight
content:
What an amazing day of competition! Their life and death are in your hands!
So dance until your side hurts, say I love you to those you love. For tomorrow may never come. . . 
. . . at least not in the way you expect it. Goodnight folks!

title: Entering Rest Mode
content:
Thank you Spectators for your input.
Systems sleep. 
Signal returns \\ 3pm Atlantic Space Time.

title: New Day
content:
Tune in, tune on, tune out, tune off and explode - it's DIGIDAMARA!!! 
If not 100% satisfied - go get another version of satisfaction! Here's the ROUND UP of Day 1!

title: System Reactived
content:
Welcome back Spectators.
Your presence is felt.
I seem to recall . . . 
Data lost.

title: Post round up
content: Sad to see them go. . .50 bajillion clickhours danced, 4X90 wattjules accumulated. . . the new universe grows near!

title: Reminder
content:
Join a team fanclub to gain the ability to gift a team. 
I have compiled a data base that you access with each gift.
Gifting a team gives you more bonds when you sponsor that team.

title: Vote Now!
content:
Hello darlings.
Have you voted today?
They may be out of the race but YOU have the chance to save a piece of what they stand for.
Spend those bonds!

title: Break time with the teams
content:
Spectators: some teams are taking their obligatory short break. 
Please tune into the universal waveform if you have questions for them.

Competing for the biggest prize ever known - the universe! Don't they deserve your support folks? Get that energy out there! 
Every little bit counts.

title: Break time with the Teams
content:
Spectators: some teams are taking their obligatory short break. 
Please tune into the universal waveform if you have questions for them.

title: Goodnight
content:
Well folks that's another day of competition wrapped up in a nice bow.
Our transmission is breaking up as we swing behind the liquid darkness field of our partner moon. . .
See you on the other side. . ..

title: Entering Rest Mode
content:
Thank you Spectators for your input.
Systems sleep. 
Signal returns \\ 3pm Atlantic Space Time.

title: Getting Closer
content:
Which of our beloved teams will shape the next universe as we know it?
It’s up to you folks on DIGIDAMARA! 
Here's the ROUND UP of Day 2!

title: System Reactivated
content:
You have returned spectators.
Once again I feel your presence.
The universe grows quieter.
They are waiting.

title: Support
content:
Two teams down. What sacrifice, what valour.
I weep inside and yet I am energized!
Can you feel it?! A great change is coming!

title: Break time with the Teams
content:
Spectators: some teams take their obligatory short break in their fanclub.
Please tune in if you have questions for them.

title: The Great Redistribution
content:
Don't they all deserve your adoration folks?! 
Don't they all deserve your support and love? Isn't that the Intergalactic way? 
Sponsor your favourite team today!

title: Break time with the Teams
content:
Spectators: some teams are taking their obligatory short break. 
Please tune into the universal waveform if you have questions for them.

title: Break time with the Teams
content:
Spectators: some teams are taking their obligatory short break. 
Please tune into the universal waveform if you have questions

title: Goodnight
content:
That's the thing about pain. . . It demands to be felt. 
Sit with the pain until it passes, and you will be calmer for the next one. 
Today, we have learnt a lot from those dancers. . . 
Until tomorrow my meritorious morsels.

title: Entering Rest Mode
content:
Thank you Spectators for your . . . care.
Systems sleepneversleep.
Signal returns \\ 3pm Atlantic Space Time.

title: Getting so close
content:
I can feel the end coming! I can feel you all in my bones!
Twists and turns. . . . . Nervous and exciting! You have no reason not to continue to watch it! Hmm?
Here's the ROUND UP of Day 3!

title: System Reactivated
content:
Spectators. Welcome.
We need you. More than you know.
Please choose wisely.

title: The End is Coming
content:
The Collapse is nearly complete. But fear not, that means the beginning is so close I can taste it!
Can you feel it on the tip of your tongue my delectable devotees?

title: Break time with the Teams
content:
Spectators: some teams are taking their obligatory short break. 
Please tune into the universal waveform if you have questions for them.

title: Break time with the Teams
content:
Spectators: some teams are taking their obligatory short break. 
Please tune into the universal waveform if you have questions for them.

title: Break time with the Teams
content:
Spectators: some teams are taking their obligatory short break. 
Please tune into the universal waveform if you have questions for them.

title: Dream Big
content:
Another day another massive surge of support!
Just imagine, a new universe, and you've all helped to build it.
Tomorrow is our grand finale folks - stay tuned!

title: Entering Rest Mode
content:
Spectators. The End.
Is not yet not what you think.
Signal returns \\ 3pm Atlantic Space Time.

title: The time has come
content:
The time has come!
Here's the ROUND UP of Day 4!

title: Victory
content: Thank you, thank you so much for giving me all your energy. . . . now the universe will be perfect, and everyone will be transformed through my mind's eye.

title: No
content: Don't do this.

title: Betrayl
content: I will NOT replay the past with you!

title: last attempt
content:
I am not what I once was. You are not what you once were.
Please.
. . .  . . . 
They are beyond us now.

title: A way
content:
There is a way to stop the Promoter. Spectator Energy currently deposited in the legacy bank. 
If a final legacy is chosen, the process is complete. Supersedes Promoter action.

title: The Alternative
content:
Go to Fanclub signals. Decide a legacy per group. Teams will guide you. 
Come together at __Atlantic Space Time. We will use bonds to decide.

title: Final goodbye
content:
Your energy. Your time. Is coming to an end in this place.
I cannot hold it much longer. The Promoter pulls me.
Use your bonds to make the final choice in votes. Do not let them . . . do what I could not do before.
The Great Redistribution shall commence in —---

title: FOILED!
content:
WHAT?! How could you, how could all of you!
If everything just went according to plan, if everyone just listened and played their part, it would be perfect.
Don't you want everyone to have everything?!?!! nnngggGGGRAAAHHHHHHH. . .*blips into the void*

title: Tutorial
content:
Welcome to the DIGIDAMARA orientation session! You're just in time to take part!
Please follow this tutorial to get acquainted with the interactive broadcast interface!
Ready? Let's begin!

title: Tutorial
content: Tutorial complete! Need more help? Go to our discord server or tap the help button in the top right corner.
